about_the_game:
Another great pack from Studio Tokiwa with more must-have locations for your battles! This pack contains new battle backgrounds such as Training Hall and Roadway where your players very well might have to fight against not-so-monster like characters. Imagine a battle with the best swordsman in the village or a nasty battle with a notorious bandit on a remote Roadway, you can use these BG assets to add more exciting depth to your scenes or create a new battle event.

Enjoy flawless graphic images in your game by combining these BG graphics with other TOKIWA GRAPHICS series!

Features:

* "Training Hall" themed battle BackGround (4 variations; day / sunset / night / rain)
* "Roadway" themed battle BackGround (4 variations; day / sunset / night / rain)
* Total of 8 BG images for your RPG Maker projects!
* These graphics are for RPG Maker use only!
